page.title: 14Homelife in Morecambe.
page.content:
A day in the life of Ian aged 9-Part 2.
When we get there Mr.Sutton reads us a story and we sing a hymn, then we go down to class again. We do Maths or English until 10.30a.m. then we go out to play for 15 minutes, and then work again until 12.00 noon. I stay for school dinner which is chips and ravioli and play until 1.15p.m. When we go back in to school we do reading and then we do some work until quarter past 2 when we have play time till 2.30. We work and have a story untill 3.30 then we go home.
